result.subject: test of double-boundary behavior
result.htmlBodyText:
This message contains double boundaries all over the place. We want to make sure that bad things don't happen.

One bad thing is that the doubled-boundary above can be mistaken for a single boundary plus a bogus premature end of headers.

Hello? Am I here?

Hello? Am I here?
result.mailHeaders:
